name: The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only (SHA Extra Plus)
description: Featuring an infinity pool, The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus is situated in Karon and offers luxury accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Serenity Spa and Fitness centre. The resort has a fitness centre with an infinity pool. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. The resort also has its very own fitness centre, Sea Pool. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar, slippers and a coffee maker. They feature an in-room dining area, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus's on-site restaurants, then later sit down to international dishes at The Harbor or Thai cuisine at Param Para. Eateries at the resort include The Nest Beach Club and Romantic in Villa. A selection of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has easy access to Kata Beach and Kata Viewpoint. Guests are able to visit Rawai and Patong, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa
description: Set in Nai Thon Beach, a few steps from Nai Thon Beach, Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 2.5 km from Banana Beach, 9.3 km from Blue Canyon Country Club and 12 km from Wat Prathong. The resort has a hot tub, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the resort all rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 15 km from Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa, while Splash Jungle Water Park is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus offers relaxing stays set on a peaceful hillside. It boasts a 680m² outdoor pool with a jetted pool, spa and free shuttles to Nai Harn Beach. Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus is a 15-minute drive from Kata Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surrounded by tropical greenery, spacious villa-style rooms feature a private balcony and outdoor rain showers. They have free WiFi and a sofa at the seating area. Guests can get a good workout at the well-equipped gym or enjoy relaxing massages at Ayurveda Destination Spa. Other facilities include a tour desk, gift shop and library. Boasting stunning sea views, the property's restaurant serves Thai Mediterranean specialities in a casual setting. There is also a wine cellar.
